OUR APPROACH

Our team of talented, dynamic and young professionals is capable of providing high and quality solutions to our clients with the right blend of technology, domain knowledge and effective methodology.

We are always dedicated to empowering our customers to achieve his/her business objectives by providing best possible innovative IT solutions and services. We transform your ideas and aspirations into your triumph through our expertise in IT, creativity and hard work. We ensure our cooperation in all stages of the growth of your enterprise and equip you with all pertaining data for your business.

E COMMERCE

Disruptive technologies have fundamentally transformed commerce, shifting power and influence from sellers to buyers. As a result, empowered consumers and eroding silos have fundamentally altered the commerce landscape forever. Because of this, business leaders need a modern commerce framework to capture their customers’ hearts, minds and wallets to lead the competition in a new world economy that is continuously evolving. At Coding Hands, we work with B2B and B2C business, marketing and and technology leaders across all sectors to transform their businesses through the design, execution and management of effective, smart commerce solutions.

INDUSTRIES

We regularly undertake the job of computerization of Offices. CodingHands implements Projects on a turnkey basis, wherein we provide the services at an affordable cost, thus ensuring enormous savings to the users as compared to what would be charged by other hardware and software consultants in the industry. The automation results in a substantial transformation of the decision making the process from the usual typing-oriented methods to hi-tech word processing, with concomitant benefits in the form of improved staff productivity, better quality documents and faster dissemination of information.

CUSTOM APPS

Make your smartphone smarter for your benefit! Need to build something custom for your own or your business, then let’s have a talk. We can help you with developing mobile applications in iOS & Android according to your requirements.
